Name: Elderflower Martini No.1
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This veritable shrubbery is both floral and grassy with dry borders.
Nutrition: One serving of Elderflower Martini No.1 contains 194 calories
